name: Embraco Starter
author: Adam Gray (Expert Hub)
short_description: Three-speed hardware PWM starter for Embraco compressors (safe Hi-Z startup & exit).
long_description: Embraco Starter safely tests Embraco inverter compressors using hardware PWM on PA7. The app opens with Help (pin set to Hi-Z), offers Power off, Low (55 Hz), Mid (100 Hz), Max (160 Hz) modes at 50% duty, and returns PA7 to Hi-Z on exit.
